forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 57F. WSW winds shifting to E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
